topComments.author: Mr. Jim Business
topComments.comment: Visited and unfortunately we didn‚Äôt see any manatees. The staff informed us there haven‚Äôt been many in the past few days other than the occasional passing by in the channel. The board shows the counts of the manatee every couple of hours. Cool place though

topComments.author: Dave P
topComments.comment: Great facility of information, helpful staff, lots of parking, and even in off season we were able to see a single manatee. In other times they mention the number is hundreds! You can spend about an hour here if you like. We saw a bunch of barracudas as well.

topComments.author: Victor Stanley (Shar and Vic)
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) Ok, ent√£o tivemos uma viagem maravilhosa para Ft Lauderdale Florida. Fomos √† Lagoa do Peixe-boi para ver o que a fam√≠lia tem assistido online. Devo dizer que n√£o estava pensando que seria √≥timo, mas para minha surpresa foi muito legal v√™-los. Fiquei espantado com todos os peixes na lagoa. N√≥s at√© vimos alguns tubar√µes-touro. O centro de informa√ß√µes foi √≥timo toneladas de coisas relacionadas a preserv√°-los.uma √≥tima loja de presentes com os pre√ßos n√£o muito altos. Voc√™ tamb√©m pode fazer doa√ß√µes. Banheiros limpos e o pessoal que trabalha l√° √© muito experiente e amig√°vel. Eu iria de novo, lembre-se tamb√©m que √© sazonal, o que significa que, se o tempo estiver mais frio, √© muito mais prov√°vel que voc√™ os veja na lagoa. Os grandes animais podem se mover tamb√©m, ent√£o n√£o pense porque eles s√£o grandes e n√£o se movem r√°pido.  (Original) Ok so we had a wonderful trip to Ft Lauderdale Florida. We went to the Manatee Lagoon to see what the family has been watching online. I have to say I wasn‚Äôt thinking it was going to be great but to my surprise it was really cool seeing them. I was amazed at all of the fish in the lagoon. We even saw some Bull Sharks. The information center was great tons of stuff related to preserving them.a great gift shop with the prices not to high. You can also make donations. Clean restrooms and the personnel working there is very knowledgeable and friendly. I would go again, also remember that it‚Äôs seasonal meaning that if the weather is cooler it‚Äôs much more likely that you will see them in the lagoon. The big animals can move too so don‚Äôt think because they are big the don‚Äôt move fast.

The museum portion was informative and nicely organized. Super nice kind staff. Hopefully next time will get to see some beautiful Manatee!

Os peixes-boi ou vacas marinhas v√™m aqui no inverno, procurando as temperaturas agradavelmente quentes desta √°rea da Fl√≥rida. Voc√™ observar√° tudo o que √© feito para cuidar deles FPL nossa empresa de eletricidade da Fl√≥rida √© respons√°vel pela manuten√ß√£o e conserva√ß√£o deste lugar maravilhoso üîù  A guarda costeira e as leis n√°uticas tamb√©m s√£o uma parte importante dos cuidados e ver√° que at√© a velocidade dos barcos nesta zona √© controlada, assim como quando passa por uma zona escolar que deve abrandar, id√™ntica üõ•  Conto-vos a minha experi√™ncia na Lagoa do Peixe-boi, reparem que os dias nublados ‚òÅÔ∏è ‚òÅÔ∏è s√£o dif√≠ceis de visualizar, tem que tentar ir com um dia de sol ‚òÄÔ∏è radiante e v√£o ver que s√£o facilmente visualizados, que devido ao fundo do mar, tamb√©m no local Voc√™ tem dois mirantes, eu recomendo o que fica no topo do pr√©dio, voc√™ pode v√™-los melhor l√°.  Me senti muito segura com os cuidados da pandemia,üò∑ eles t√™m dispensador de √°lcool em gel em todas as √°reas, a reserva √© bem ventilada, os banheiros üöª s√£o arrumadinhos üíßvoc√™ pode comprar lembran√ßas relacionadas aos peixes-boi Lugar educativo üíØ % cuidado com o meio ambiente üåé‚ôªÔ∏è  (Original) Excelente lugar MANATEE LAGOON - UN CENTRO DE ECODESCUBRIMIENTO DE FPL Est√° ubicado en West Palm Beach en 6000 North Flagler Drive West Palm Beach, FL 33407  Abierto todos los d√≠as durante la temporada de manat√≠es (del 15 de noviembre al 31 de marzo); cerrado los lunes durante el resto del a√±o (1 de abril - 14 de noviembre) Horas de operaci√≥n: 9 am a 4 pm  Su acceso es Gratuitoooo  Esta reserva nos ayuda a entender m√°s de la vida de estos hermosos ejemplares en peligro de  extinci√≥n. Los Manat√≠es √≥ Vacas Marinas vienen aqu√≠  en √©poca de invierno , buscando las agradables temperaturas caliente de esta zona de la Florida. Observar√°s todo lo que se hace para cuidarlos FPL nuestra empresa de electricidad de la Florida es la encargada de el mantenimiento y conservaci√≥n de este maravilloso lugar üîù  Los guardacostas y las leyes n√°uticas tambi√©n forman parte importante en el cuidado y ver√°s que hasta la velocidad de las embarcaciones en esta √°rea es controlada, as√≠ como cuando pasas por un area escolar que debes reducir la velocidad, id√©ntico üõ•  Les cuento  mi experiencia en Manatee Lagoon, note que los d√≠as nublado ‚òÅÔ∏è ‚òÅÔ∏è es dif√≠cil de visualizarlos,  tienes que tratar de ir con un d√≠a de sol ‚òÄÔ∏è radiante y ver√°s que se visualizan  con facilidad, eso debido al fondo marin√≥, tambi√©n en el lugar tienes dos miradores, les recomiendo el de la parte alta en el edificio all√≠ los ves mejor.  Me sent√≠ muy segura con los cuidados de la pandemia,üò∑ tienen dispensador de hand sanitizer en todas sus √°reas, la reserva es muy ventilada, sus ba√±os üöª son pulcros üíßpuedes comprar souvenir relacionados con los Manat√≠es Lugar educativo üíØ % cuidado ambiental üåé‚ôªÔ∏è

topComments.author: Anita Wong Yiu
topComments.comment: (Tradu√ß√£o do Google) √ìtimo lugar para aprender sobre peixes-boi e at√© mesmo ver alguns!! (Original) Great place to learn about Manatees and to even see some!! We did not see any this trip, but visited the grounds, gift shop and took pictures!! Very accessible. They have a ramp leading from the side/back area to inside of the information center. They even had a penny machine and $ exchange where you can exchange your bigger bills for $1 and $5 to get collectible pennies!

topComments.author: m
topComments.comment: Highly recommend! Free admission, suggested $5 donation to maintain the facility, staff, and marine life research.  There are several tanks, and a second floor, with local marine life. You can learn about invasive species in the area, and general q&a about manatees and other creatures too!  You can see many species swimming off the docks! Today, I saw parrotfish, sheepshead, porkfish, nurse shark, barracuda, gar (needlefish)  I definitely plan on returning next time I am in the area! Worth the visit. Expect to spend 30 minute minimum here, and up to 1 and a half hours if you are there for the daily sea talks, and if you read all the facts! 10/10 attraction  Also: check the gift shop for some upcycled jewelry from @seastainablymade (Instagram). Featuring earrings made from local found shark teach, and 100% recycled bracelets, upcycled from braided fishing line, picked off the piers locally!
